message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think it would really benefit you and I'm willing to part with it for $14,000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13,500. Would you be willing to consider that?
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm looking for a bit closer to my original price. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $13,750?
I'm still a bit far from my target, but I'm willing to compromise. How about $13,200?
